dmca.title: Google Asked to Remove Distance Learning Site from Index (#1)
dmca.body:
05/01/2002 13:56     [private]	WORLDWIDELEARN		PAGE 01

WORLD WIDE LEARN
ONLINE LEARNING
THE WORLD'S DIRECTORY OF ONLINE COURSES, ONLINE LEARNING AND ONLINE EDUCATION


May 1, 2002

VIA FACSIMILE [private]

General Counsel
Google, Inc.
[private]
Mountain View CA 94043

Dear Sirs/Mesdames:

Re:	Copyright Infringement by distancelearningsite.com

I understand that American search engines are required to comply with The Digital Millennium Copyright Act and am writing to report an illegal copying of my website by a website that is now appearing in your search engine database.

I am the owner of an exclusive right to World Wide Learn, a website at http://www.worldwidelearn.com, of whose copyright is being infringed by a website at http://www.distancelearningsite.com. Each page at http://www.worldwidelearn.com is clearly marked that it is under copyright protection.

The website at http://www.distancelearningsite.com is an illegal reproduction of my site at http://www.worldwidelearn.com and the owner of this http://www.distancelearningsite.com site has illegally copied HTML code, content and pages from my site at http://www.worldwidelearn.com .

I have good faith belief that use of HTML code, text, content and pages from http://www.worldwidelearn.com is not authorized by myself, the owner; nor by an agent, nor by the law.

I have initiated legal proceedings against http://www.distancelearningsite.com, including a Cease & Desist letter requesting they remove their site.

I ask that you remove this http://www.distancelearningsite.com site from your search engine database or take whatever steps that are in accordance with your company policy regarding a situation such as this.

This information provided by me in this letter is accurate under penalty of perjury and as owner of http://www.worldwidelearn.com, I am authorized to act as owner of the exclusive right that is being infringed.

If you need further information or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Yours truly,

World Wide Learn
Per:	[private]
	President


www.WORLDWIDELEARN.com
[private], Calgary, Alberta T2T 0B2
PH: [private]    FX: [private]    [private]
